name: ai-coding-agent-protocol
description: Comprehensive AI-driven development workflow (GODMODE) with 13 modular slash commands, OWASP security checklists, multi-agent Fresh Eyes review, and structured phases for planning, execution, and finalization.
features: 13 modular slash commands with hybrid invocation (interactive + direct)
Multi-agent Fresh Eyes Review (zero-context for unbiased review)
Context-efficient design (behavioral triggers, not documentation bloat)
